sc-upload-listview-template.desc:
The `<sc-upload-list-view-template>` element is a basic template element that can use the custom fields of the List View of the `<sc-upload>` element, including header name, binding field, resize, movement, alignment, and style. You can implement custom fields using properties such as name.

### Basic example

The List View of the `<sc-upload>` element provides the `sc-upload-listview-template` element so that custom fields can be added and used to show information of specific fields in the attached file list information.

 <sc-upload title-text="Attachment">
 This is an element that can implement custom fields, and header names and data binding can be implemented using the headerText and dataField properties.
 <sc-upload-listview-template header-text="Test" data-field="name"></sc-upload-listview-template>
 </sc-upload>

properties.name: dataField
properties.desc: This is the field name bound to the List View field.

properties.name: displayField
properties.desc: Specifies the property of the value to be displayed on the screen among the items array.

properties.name: editable
properties.desc: This property is whether the List View field can be modified.

properties.name: flexWidth
properties.desc: Whether to use the variable width of the field. If the value is `true`, the width is automatically calculated according to the width of `<sc-upload>`.

properties.name: formatType
properties.desc: This is a formatter-related property.

properties.name: generateHeader
properties.desc: Creates and returns a header element for the field.

properties.name: generateTemplate
properties.desc: Creates a `template` for the field and returns an element with CSS style and binding syntax applied.

properties.name: headerEventDisabled
properties.desc: Disable header functions (sorting, position movement, size change).

properties.name: headerText
properties.desc: This is the header name of List View.

properties.name: isFlexWidth
properties.desc: Returns whether the field uses variable width.

properties.name: items
properties.desc: Array of items to be displayed in dropdown.

properties.name: maskRe
properties.desc: This is a string for input control using regular expressions.

properties.name: maxLength
properties.desc: This is the maximum number of strings entered by the user that can be included in the text field.

properties.name: minLength
properties.desc: This is the minimum number of strings that the user must enter into the text field.

properties.name: minWidth
properties.desc: This is the minimum width of the field. When the `resizable` feature is enabled, the size cannot be changed to be smaller than minWidth.

properties.name: readonly
properties.desc: This property is for custom field readonly mode.

properties.name: reorderable
properties.desc: Whether to change the order of fields. If the value is `true`, the function to change the order of fields is activated.

properties.name: required
properties.desc: This property indicates whether a custom field is required.

properties.name: resizable
properties.desc: Whether to change the size of the field. If the value is `true`, the field size change function is activated.

properties.name: sortable
properties.desc: Whether to use the field's sorting function. If the value is `false', the field's sorting function is disabled.

properties.name: styleName
properties.desc: This is the CSS style name of the field.

properties.name: templateId
properties.desc: This is the unique ID of the field.

properties.name: tooltip
properties.desc: Tooltip?

properties.name: type
properties.desc: This is a List View field type property.

properties.name: valueField
properties.desc: Specifies the value property of the items array.

properties.name: visible
properties.desc: Marked or not

properties.name: width
properties.desc: This is the width of the field.

properties.name: __bundleName
properties.desc: This is the name to use as a prefix when processing multiple languages.

properties.name: _bindDataField
properties.desc: Creates and returns a binding grammar based on the dataField name of the field.

properties.name: hostAttributes
properties.desc: properties of host

Polymer.SCUploadListViewTemplateBehavior.desc: SCUploadListViewTemplateBehavior is a collection of custom field behaviors used in the List View of the `<sc-upload>` element. It creates template elements for header and content settings for header name, binding field, resize, movement, alignment, and style.
